document.full_text: al qaeda's north african branch released messages from four french hostages it kidnapped in niger, who called for france to respond to the militant group's demand that france withdraw troops from afghanistan.
document.title: al qaeda releases tape from french hostages
lines_and_colors: al qaeda's north african branch released messages from four french hostages it kidnapped in niger, who called for france to respond to the militant group's demand that france withdraw troops from afghanistan.
